author: Vect0r
name: ventcontrol
short: Clears a channel of messages every X minutes.
description: An automated message purging system. Features configurable intervals, pause/resume functionality.
install_msg: Thanks for installing ventcontrol! Use `[p]ventconfig add #channel 30` to set up automatic message purging every 30 minutes. Type `[p]help vent` for a full list of commands.
